title: Keyboard Simulator 2015
description: A little app/experiment stemming from my admirance of mechanical keyboards that plays clicky sounds with every keydown and keyup event, and shows a neat custom CSS keyboard animation that maps to each key you press. Oddly satisfying to watch and listen to. Guaranteed at least 5 minutes of entertainment.

title: clebcraft
description: My friend made a Minecraft server and I wanted an easy way to see who was online and other server statistics. This is a small, responsive app built in Angular that polls the Minecraft server every 5 seconds for information. (discalimer: site subject to go offline on the whim of Caleb's basement server)

title: Emoji Converter for Slack
description: After a breakthrough one productive afternoon at work, I realized I could make ASCII art with Slack emojis. Subsequently, I automated this process.

title: Finger Trainer
description: Once I acquired a featureless Das Keyboard, I realized I was really bad at touch-typing the top row of keys. So I made this tool to help me.
